A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Just a huge letdown. Plot is sad\, no energy. Terrible characters. I'm a liberal and this shit went over the edge with the PC crap. Its Star Wars universe guys. I will never like this movie\, watched it as many times as I could stand. To the critics: Why can't you accept that this is trash? You bashed Phantom Menace and made Lucas give up on Jar Jar.. And now you're telling me this movie is a masterpiece? What a shame. Its the worst Star Wars movie ever. Hands down.
